items.name: Watcher's Eye
explicitMods: 4% increased maximum Energy Shield
5% increased maximum Life
6% increased maximum Mana
You take 54% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes while affected by Determination
6% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Fire Damage while affected by Purity of Fire
+15% chance to Suppress Spell Damage while affected by Grace
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: One by one, they stood their ground against a creature
they had no hope of understanding, let alone defeating,
and one by one, they became a part of it.

items.name: Warrior's Tale
implicitMods: 21% reduced Effect of Curses on you
explicitMods: 100% increased effect of Tattoos in Radius
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The story of a life, written in blood and ink.

items.name: Forbidden Flesh
explicitMods: Allocates Necromancer if you have the matching modifier on Forbidden Flame
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The bodies of those wholly subsumed by the Tangle
continue to merge and mutate and cry out for release...

items.typeLine: Resplendent Hypnotic Eye Jewel of Coals
explicitMods: Adds 6 to 9 Fire Damage to Spells
+37 to maximum Energy Shield
items.descrText: Place into an Abyssal Socket on an Item or into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Forbidden Flame
explicitMods: Allocates Necromancer if you have the matching modifier on Forbidden Flesh
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The minds of those studied utterly by the Cleansing Fire
continue to think and dream and beg for silence...

items.name: Empyrean Cut
enchantMods: Added Small Passive Skills grant: 6% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +7% to Chaos Resistance
Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +14 to Dexterity
Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +9 to Maximum Mana
Added Small Passive Skills have 35% increased Effect
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Small, Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Phoenix Heart
enchantMods: Added Small Passive Skills grant: 6% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +4% to Chaos Resistance
Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +12 to Maximum Energy Shield
Added Small Passive Skills also grant: Regenerate 0.2% of Life per Second
Added Small Passive Skills have 35% increased Effect
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Small, Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Behemoth Curio
enchantMods: Added Small Passive Skills grant: 6% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +14 to Dexterity
Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +5 to Maximum Life
Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +13 to Strength
Added Small Passive Skills have 35% increased Effect
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Small, Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Impossible Escape
explicitMods:
Passives in Radius of Acrobatics can be Allocated
without being connected to your tree
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: She was the last of countless progeny bred to test the limits of limitless power.
In the cosmic prison of her birth, her siblings fought each other to the death
for supremacy. She alone reached her limit... and broke through.

items.name: Glorious Vanity
explicitMods:
Bathed in the blood of 4648 sacrificed in the name of Ahuana
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Vaal
Historic
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: They believed themselves the pinnacle of civilisation, but that height toppled their empire.
